Package sc.plugin2014.gui

Class Summary
AdministrativeGameHandler  
GamePreparation A game preparation lets the client connect to the server and open a new game.
GUIPluginFacade This is the GUIPlugin interface that is loaded by the server when it loads the plugins
HumanGameHandler  
Observation The observation watches the game and is informed by the GUI client when something happens
ObserverGameHandler  
Slot Holds a place for a potential client (that can be a remote client or a human client i.e.)
